医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
ARMGO Pharma 在 ARM210 治疗儿茶酚胺能多形性室性心动过速的 2 期试验中招募了第一位患者研究 ARM210 治疗儿茶酚胺能多形性室性心动过速 (CPVT) 的安全性和有效性的试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/ARMGO-Pharma-Enrolls-First-Patient-in-Phase-2-Trial-of-ARM210-for-the-Treatment-of-Catecholaminergic-Polymorphic-Ventrillary-Tachycardia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/ARMGO-Pharma-Enrolls-First-Patient-in-Phase-2-Trial-of-ARM210-for-the-Treatment-of-Catecholaminergic-Polymorphic-Ventrillary-Tachycardia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=878e05dd-bc7a-4b1d-a804-d1e0f75c7f2b Fri, 21 Jul 2023 07:04:00 -0400 ARMGO Pharma Enrolls First Patient in Phase 2 Trial of ARM210 for the Treatment of Catecholaminergic Polymorphic Ventricular Tachycardia
Unchained Labs 全力进军脂质纳米粒子领域，收购 Blacktrace Holdings Unchained Labs 是一家致力于为生物制品和基因治疗研究人员提供适合工作的工具的生命科学公司，今天收购了 Blacktrace Holdings。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Unchained-Labs-goes-all-in-on-Lipid-Nanoarticles-acquires-Blacktrace-Holdings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Unchained-Labs-goes-all-in-on-Lipid-Nanoarticles-acquires-Blacktrace-Holdings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a69d9bb-ca62-4c4e-8635-1b767be5e048 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 06:58:00 -0400 Unchained Labs goes all in on Lipid Nanoparticles, acquires Blacktrace Holdings
Tecan 的 Phase Separator™：推进液体活检和生物样本库的自动化Tecan 自豪地推出 Phase Separator™，这是一种创新的液体分离技术，有望节省时间并提高实验室工作流程的准确性。通过在液体活检和生物样本库中的具体应用，其优势将体现在基因组学、蛋白质组学以及从肿瘤学、神经退行性疾病到代谢紊乱等多个疾病领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Tecans-Phase-Separatore284a2-advancing-automation-for-liquid-biopsy-and-biobanking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Tecans-Phase-Separatore284a2-advancing-automation-for-liquid-biopsy-and-biobanking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=debbedf0-52b3-4ce9-8fa1-917121bda8bd Fri, 21 Jul 2023 06:56:00 -0400 Tecan's Phase Separator™: advancing automation for liquid biopsy and biobanking
流感和 COVID-19 报告提供最新监测数据和公共卫生建议这份每两周一次的流感和 COVID-19 报告汇集了最新的监测数据以及最新的公共卫生建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Flu-and-COVID-19-report-offers-latest-surveillance-data-and-public-health-advice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Flu-and-COVID-19-report-offers-latest-surveillance-data-and-public-health-advice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c837ca02-30e2-460b-a8a2-1afecd1f2ba5 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 06:55:58 -0400 Flu and COVID-19 report offers latest surveillance data and public health advice
基于模型的方法来评估针对 SARS-CoV-2 相关变体的疫苗有效性一组研究人员检查了更新疫苗和变体匹配加强疫苗的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/A-model-based-approach-to-estimating-vaccine-effectness-against-SARS-CoV-2-variants-of-concern.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/A-model-based-approach-to-estimating-vaccine-effectness-against-SARS-CoV-2-variants-of-concern.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fcc9c025-a7f5-4942-8fb7-a62a426e3e22 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 06:51:00 -0400 A model-based approach to estimating vaccine effectiveness against SARS-CoV-2 variants of concern
医疗债务让美国人感到愤怒。医生和医院若忽视这一点，就会面临危险。对于 Emily Boller 来说，一个简单的红眼病就需要支付 5,000 美元的医院费用，花了四年时间才还清。对于玛丽·柯利来说，是 2.5 年后收到的一封来自实验室的威胁性催款信，当时她的丈夫失业了，一家人正在为拯救家园而奋斗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Medical-debt-is-making-Americans-angry-Doctors-and-hospitals-ignore-this-at-their-peril.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Medical-debt-is-making-Americans-angry-Doctors-and-hospitals-ignore-this-at-their-peril.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8e7ff9c-25c5-4196-b6f7-5d3f659da6c3 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 06:43:17 -0400 Medical debt is making Americans angry. Doctors and hospitals ignore this at their peril.
加州的行业团体争夺新的医疗补助资金加州强大的医疗保健行业刚刚取得了历史性胜利：该州将向其注资 111 亿美元，以改善对数百万低收入医疗补助患者的护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Industry-groups-in-California-vie-for-new-Medicaid-money.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Industry-groups-in-California-vie-for-new-Medicaid-money.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=073d5506-8d2a-4b5f-868b-b96c702df804 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 06:42:25 -0400 Industry groups in California vie for new Medicaid money
当他们以前的医院陷入困境时，医生们创建了一家初级保健诊所大约一年前，家庭医生瓦洛里·旺勒 (Valory Wangler) 邀请了几位前同事到她的后院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Doctors-created-a-primary-care-clinic-as-their-former-hospital-struggled.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Doctors-created-a-primary-care-clinic-as-their-former-hospital-struggled.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5eb1e68f-22bd-4860-9f38-ece440695af7 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 06:40:41 -0400 Doctors created a primary care clinic as their former hospital struggled
COPD 患者的百日咳疫苗接种反应研究人员评估了慢性阻塞性肺病患者对百日咳疫苗接种的体液和细胞免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Pertussis-vaccination-responses-in-COPD-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Pertussis-vaccination-responses-in-COPD-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62021b0a-e467-42ad-b405-14772827c0dd Fri, 21 Jul 2023 06:27:00 -0400 Pertussis vaccination responses in COPD patients
实现供应商参与的潜力在本次针对 ELRIG 2023 年药物发现会议进行的采访中，我们采访了 ELRIG 供应商战略工作组负责人 Nick Clare，了解供应商可以通过参加 ELRIG 活动（例如 2023 年药物发现）获得什么。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Realizing-the-Potential-of-Vendor-Engagement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Realizing-the-Potential-of-Vendor-Engagement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=792036ab-d18b-4bb9-b07c-0cd62331015b Fri, 21 Jul 2023 06:04:00 -0400 Realizing the Potential of Vendor Engagement
